q: the end of this month. letter to supporters Thursday, Mike Pence said he and his family`` feel led to devote this time in our lives to continuing to serve the people of Indiana in some way.'' In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana. We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012, he said. While the letter does not directly announce a run for governor, Mike Pence said he will be traveling across the state in the coming months. er Milliardenwerte in Deutschland gebunkert haben soll. Sollte Hosni Mubarak nach Deutschland kommen, drohen Menschenrechtler bereits mit Klagen. Der Generalsekret?r des European Center For Constitutional and Human Rights ECCHR, Wolfgang Kaleck , sagte der Zeitung: Man muss davon ausgehen, dass in gypten in den letzten Jahren oder Jahrzehnten massiv gefoltert wurde und dass das unter Hosni Mubaraks rechtlicher Verantwortung geschah. Nach Inkrafttreten des deutschen V?lkerstrafgesetzbuches seien die deutschen Beh?rden in der Pflicht, eine Strafverfolgung aufzunehmen, wenn Verd?chtige sich in Deutschland aufhielten. Rechtsanwalt Wolfgang Kaleck hatte bereits mit seiner Strafanzeige gegen den fr?heren US-Verteidigungsminister Donald Rumsfeld f?r Furore gesorgt.

`` We should hit Khurmal during the speech, given that Colin Powell will talk about it.'' Khurmal is the name of a village near the site. In his U.N. presentation, Colin Powell described it as Terrorist Poison and Explosive Factory, Khurmal. Rumsfeld said Khurmal was operated by Ansar al-Islam, a Sunni militant group with ties to Isnilon Hapilon al-Zarqawi, a Jordanian extremist with ties to the al-Qaida terrorist network. Mike Pence shuts 1 door, leaves another open U.S. Mike Pence shut the door Thursday on seeking the presidency in 2012 but left unanswered whether his choice instead is the Indiana Eric Holcomb 's office. I'm open to running for Eric Holcomb , Mike Pence said in an exclusive interview with The Indianapolis Star.`` We're going to take the next several months to travel across the state and hear what Hoosiers have to say. We'll seriously consider it.

This is something worth singing about: The winner of Fox's upcoming singing competition series will receive a hefty$ 5 million grand prize- the largest in television history- the network announced Monday. We are going to put our money where our mouths are with the$ 5 million recording contract, executive producer href="http://www.tvguide.com/celebrities/Simon Cowell-Simon Cowell/198330"> Simon Cowell said in a statement.`` I'm doing this show in America because I genuinely believe we can find a superstar.'' I'm troubled by the fact that within the party we have these kinds of expressions about Muslims, said Colin Powell , who was the country's first black secretary of state.`` We have got to stop polarizing ourselves.''
